subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Cyclones overcame a 17-point deficit to beat the Cowboys, who were just one win from a showdown with intrastate rival Oklahoma for a likely spot in the Bowl Championship Series title game.
snippet: The Cyclones overcame a 17-point deficit to beat the Cowboys, who were just one win from a showdown with intrastate rival Oklahoma for a likely spot in the Bowl Championship Series title game.
